code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";export var todoListSelector=function todoListSelector(state){return state.todoList;};export var statusFilterSelector=function statusFilterSelector(state){return state.filter.status;};export var searchTextSelector=function searchTextSelector(state){return state.filter.search;};export var priorityFilterSelector=function priorityFilterSelector(state){return state.filter.priority;};export var isRemoveSelector=function isRemoveSelector(state){return state.filter.isRemoved;};export var todoListRemainSelector=createSelector(todoListSelector,statusFilterSelector,searchTextSelector,priorityFilterSelector,function(todoList,status,searchText,priority,isRemoved){return todoList.filter(function(todo){if(!todo.isRemoved){if(status==="All"){return priority.length?todo.name.includes(searchText)&&priority.includes(todo.priority):todo.name.includes(searchText);}return todo.name.includes(searchText)&&(status==="Completed"?todo.completed:!todo.completed)&&(priority.length?priority.priority.includes(todo.priority):true);}});});
